name: The Simple Notion Dashboard
description: Why use this template ?Everybody is on the hunt for the perfect and most complex Notion Dashboard that can do everything. While such a template might be good for some people, for many it is simply too much. The Simple Dashboard provides you with the bare minimums for a Dashboard where you can easily get to work and extend it like you want.When downloading this free template, you will also get a 50% discount for a collection of 175+ Notion Covers which you can find here 175+ Gradient Notion Cover
